00028 qreal const EndpointConnection::MIN_LENGTH = 10;
00029 qreal const EndpointConnection::MIN_START_LENGTH = EndpointItem::WIDTH / 2 + GridSize;

00031 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00032 // Function: EndpointConnection()
00033 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00034 EndpointConnection::EndpointConnection(EndpointItem* endpoint1, EndpointItem* endpoint2,
00035                                        bool autoConnect, QGraphicsItem* parent) : QGraphicsPathItem(parent),
00036                                                                                   endpoint1_(0), endpoint2_(0),
00037                                                                                   pathPoints_(), selected_(-1),
00038                                                                                   selectionType_(NONE)
00039 {
00040     setItemSettings();
00041     createRoute(endpoint1, endpoint2);
00042 
00043     if (autoConnect)
00044     {
00045         endpoint1_ = endpoint1;
00046         endpoint2_ = endpoint2;
00047 
00048         endpoint1->addConnection(this);
00049         endpoint2->addConnection(this);
00050         updateName();
00051     }
00052 }

00076 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00077 // Function: setRoute()
00078 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00079 void EndpointConnection::setRoute(QList<QPointF> path)
00080 {
00081     if (path.size() < 2)
00082         return;
00083 
00084     if (endpoint1_)
00085     {
00086         QVector2D dir = QVector2D(path[1] - path[0]).normalized();
00087 
00088         // Switch the direction of the end point if it is not correct.
00089         if (QVector2D::dotProduct(dir, endpoint1_->getDirectionVector()) < 0)
00090         {
00091             if (dir.x() > 0)
00092             {
00093                 endpoint1_->setDirection(EndpointItem::DIR_RIGHT);
00094             }
00095             else
00096             {
00097                 endpoint1_->setDirection(EndpointItem::DIR_LEFT);
00098             }
00099         }
00100     }
00101 
00102     if (endpoint2_)
00103     {
00104         QVector2D dir = QVector2D(path[path.size() - 2] - path[path.size() - 1]).normalized();
00105 
00106         // Switch the direction of the end point if it is not correct.
00107         if (QVector2D::dotProduct(dir, endpoint2_->getDirectionVector()) < 0)
00108         {
00109             if (dir.x() > 0)
00110             {
00111                 endpoint2_->setDirection(EndpointItem::DIR_RIGHT);
00112             }
00113             else
00114             {
00115                 endpoint2_->setDirection(EndpointItem::DIR_LEFT);
00116             }
00117         }
00118     }
00119 
00120     QListIterator<QPointF> i(path);
00121 
00122     QPainterPath painterPath(i.next());
00123 
00124     while (i.hasNext()) {
00125         painterPath.lineTo(i.next());
00126     }
00127 
00128     QPainterPathStroker stroker;
00129     setPath(stroker.createStroke(painterPath));
00130 
00131     if (path != pathPoints_)
00132     {
00133         pathPoints_ = path;
00134         emit contentChanged();
00135     }
00136 }
00137 
00138 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00139 // Function: updatePosition()
00140 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00141 void EndpointConnection::updatePosition()
00142 {
00143     QVector2D delta1 = QVector2D(endpoint1_->scenePos()) - QVector2D(pathPoints_.first());
00144     QVector2D delta2 = QVector2D(endpoint2_->scenePos()) - QVector2D(pathPoints_.last());
00145     QVector2D const& dir1 = endpoint1_->getDirectionVector();
00146     QVector2D const& dir2 = endpoint2_->getDirectionVector();
00147 
00148     // Recreate the route from scratch if there are not enough points in the path or
00149     // the route is too complicated when the position and direction of the endpoints is considered.
00150     if (pathPoints_.size() < 2 ||
00151         (pathPoints_.size() > 4 && qFuzzyCompare(QVector2D::dotProduct(dir1, dir2), -1.0) &&
00152         QVector2D::dotProduct(dir1, QVector2D(endpoint2_->scenePos() - endpoint1_->scenePos())) > 0.0))
00153     {
00154         createRoute(endpoint1_, endpoint2_);
00155         return;
00156     }
00157 
00158     // If the delta movement of both endpoints was the same, we can just
00159     // move all route points by the delta1.
00160     if (qFuzzyCompare(delta1, delta2))
00161     {
00162         if (!delta1.isNull())
00163         {
00164             for (int i = 0; i < pathPoints_.size(); ++i)
00165             {
00166                 pathPoints_[i] += delta1.toPointF();
00167             }
00168 
00169             setRoute(pathPoints_);
00170         }
00171     }
00172     // Otherwise check if either the first or the last point was moved.
00173     else if (!delta1.isNull() || !delta2.isNull())
00174     {
00175         bool pathOk = false;
00176         QVector2D delta = delta1;
00177         QVector2D dir = dir1;
00178         EndpointItem* endpoint = endpoint1_;
00179         int index0 = 0;
00180         int index1 = 1;
00181         int index2 = 2;
00182         int index3 = 3;
00183 
00184         if (!delta2.isNull())
00185         {
00186             delta = delta2;
00187             endpoint = endpoint2_;
00188             dir = dir2;
00189             index0 = pathPoints_.size() - 1;
00190             index1 = pathPoints_.size() - 2;
00191             index2 = pathPoints_.size() - 3;
00192             index3 = pathPoints_.size() - 4;
00193         }
00194 
00195         QVector2D seg1 = QVector2D(pathPoints_[index1] - pathPoints_[index0]).normalized();
00196 
00197         // Check if the endpoints should be directed in another way.
00198         if (dir1.x() * (endpoint2_->scenePos().x() - endpoint1_->scenePos().x()) < 0.0 ||
00199             dir2.x() * (endpoint1_->scenePos().x() - endpoint2_->scenePos().x()) < 0.0)
00200         {
00201             pathOk = false;
00202         }
00203         // Try to fix the first segment with perpendicular projection.
00204         else if (pathPoints_.size() >= 4 && pathPoints_.size() < 7 && qFuzzyCompare(dir, seg1))
00205         {
00206             QVector2D perp = delta - QVector2D::dotProduct(delta, seg1) * seg1;
00207             pathPoints_[index1] += perp.toPointF();
00208 
00209             // The path is ok if the moved point is still in view (not behind the left edge).
00210             pathOk = pathPoints_[index1].x() >= 10.0;
00211         }
00212 
00213         // Handle the parallel part of the delta.
00214         pathPoints_[index0] = endpoint->scenePos();
00215         QVector2D newSeg1 = QVector2D(pathPoints_[index1] - pathPoints_[index0]);
00216 
00217         if (newSeg1.length() < MIN_START_LENGTH || !qFuzzyCompare(seg1, newSeg1.normalized()))
00218         {
00219             pathOk = false;
00220         }
00221 
00222         // Check for a special case when there would be intersecting parallel lines.
00223         if (pathOk && pathPoints_.size() >= 4)
00224         {
00225             QVector2D seg2 = QVector2D(pathPoints_[index2] - pathPoints_[index1]).normalized();
00226             QVector2D seg3 = QVector2D(pathPoints_[index3] - pathPoints_[index2]).normalized();
00227 
00228             if (QVector2D::dotProduct(seg1, seg2) < 0.0f ||
00229                 (seg2.isNull() && QVector2D::dotProduct(seg1, seg3) < 0.0f))
00230             {
00231                 pathOk = false;
00232             }
00233         }
00234 
00235         // Snap the middle path points to grid.
00236         for (int i = 1; i < pathPoints_.size() - 1; ++i)
00237         {
00238             pathPoints_[i] = snapPointToGrid(pathPoints_[i]);
00239         }
00240 
00241         // If the simple fix didn't result in a solution, just recreate the route.
00242         if (!pathOk)
00243         {
00244             createRoute(endpoint1_, endpoint2_);
00245         }
00246         else
00247         {
00248             //simplifyPath();
00249             setRoute(pathPoints_);
00250         }
00251     }
00252 
00253     emit contentChanged();
00254 }
00255 
00256 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00257 // Function: connectEnds()
00258 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00259 bool EndpointConnection::connectEnds()
00260 {
00261     if (!scene())
00262         return false;
00263 
00264     prepareGeometryChange();
00265 
00266     // Disconnect the previous ends.
00267     disconnectEnds();
00268 
00269     // Find the new end points.
00270     endpoint1_ = DiagramUtil::snapToItem<EndpointItem>(pathPoints_.first(), scene(), GridSize);
00271     Q_ASSERT(endpoint1_ != 0);
00272 
00273     endpoint2_ = DiagramUtil::snapToItem<EndpointItem>(pathPoints_.last(), scene(), GridSize);
00274     Q_ASSERT(endpoint2_ != 0);
00275 
00276     // Make the connections and check for errors.
00277     if (!endpoint1_->onConnect(endpoint2_))
00278     {
00279         endpoint1_ = 0;
00280         return false;
00281     }
00282 
00283     if (!endpoint2_->onConnect(endpoint1_))
00284     {
00285         endpoint1_->onDisconnect(endpoint2_);
00286         endpoint1_ = 0;
00287         endpoint2_ = 0;
00288         return false;
00289     }
00290 
00291     endpoint1_->addConnection(this);
00292     endpoint2_->addConnection(this);
00293 
00294     // Check if both end points were found.
00295     if (endpoint1_ && endpoint2_) {
00296         simplifyPath();
00297         setRoute(pathPoints_);
00298         updateName();
00299         return true;
00300     }
00301 
00302     foreach (QGraphicsItem *item, scene()->items(pathPoints_.first())) {
00303         if (item == this)
00304             continue;
00305 
00306         if (item->type() == EndpointConnection::Type) {
00307             EndpointConnection *segment
00308                 = qgraphicsitem_cast<EndpointConnection *>(item);
00309 
00310             if (segment->getRoute().last() == pathPoints_.first()) {
00311                 QList<QPointF> newPath = segment->getRoute();
00312                 newPath.append(pathPoints_);
00313                 pathPoints_ = newPath;
00314                 scene()->removeItem(segment);
00315                 delete segment;
00316 
00317                 return connectEnds();
00318             } else if (segment->getRoute().first() == pathPoints_.first()) {
00319                 QList<QPointF> newPath = segment->getRoute();
00320                 for(int i = 0; i < (newPath.size()/2); i++)
00321                     newPath.swap(i, newPath.size()-(1+i));
00322                 newPath.append(pathPoints_);
00323                 pathPoints_ = newPath;
00324                 scene()->removeItem(segment);
00325                 delete segment;
00326 
00327                 return connectEnds();
00328             }
00329         }
00330     }
00331 
00332     foreach (QGraphicsItem *item, scene()->items(pathPoints_.last())) {
00333         if (item == this)
00334             continue;
00335 
00336         if (item->type() == EndpointConnection::Type) {
00337             EndpointConnection *segment
00338                 = qgraphicsitem_cast<EndpointConnection *>(item);
00339 
00340             if (segment->getRoute().first() == pathPoints_.last()) {
00341                 pathPoints_.append(segment->getRoute());
00342                 scene()->removeItem(segment);
00343                 delete segment;
00344 
00345                 return connectEnds();
00346             } else if (segment->getRoute().last() == pathPoints_.last()) {
00347                 QList<QPointF> newPath = segment->getRoute();
00348                 for(int i = 0; i < (newPath.size()/2); i++)
00349                     newPath.swap(i, newPath.size()-(1+i));
00350                 pathPoints_.append(newPath);
00351                 scene()->removeItem(segment);
00352                 delete segment;
00353 
00354                 return connectEnds();
00355             }
00356         }
00357     }
00358 
00359     simplifyPath();
00360     setRoute(pathPoints_);
00361     updateName();
00362     return true;
00363 }

00410 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00411 // Function: createRoute()
00412 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00413 void EndpointConnection::createRoute(QPointF p1, QPointF p2,
00414                                      QVector2D const& dir1, QVector2D const& dir2)
00415 {
00416     pathPoints_.clear();
00417 
00418     // Convert the points to vectors.
00419     QVector2D startPos = QVector2D(p1);
00420     QVector2D endPos = QVector2D(p2);
00421 
00422     // Sets the start position as the current position.
00423     QVector2D curPos = startPos;
00424     QVector2D curDir = dir1;
00425 
00426     // Set the target position based on the end point's direction.
00427     QVector2D targetPos = QVector2D(p2) + dir2 * MIN_START_LENGTH;
00428 
00429     // Add the start position to the painter path.
00430     QPainterPath path(curPos.toPointF());
00431     pathPoints_ << curPos.toPointF();
00432 
00433     if (startPos != endPos)
00434     {
00435         // Find a route to the target.
00436         while (curPos != targetPos)
00437         {
00438             // Calculate the delta.
00439             QVector2D delta = targetPos - curPos;
00440             qreal dot = QVector2D::dotProduct(delta, curDir);
00441             qreal endDot = QVector2D::dotProduct(delta, dir2);
00442 
00443             // Calculate the projection onto the current direction and the perpendicular part.
00444             QVector2D proj = dot * curDir;
00445             QVector2D perp = delta - proj;
00446 
00447             // Check if we can draw a direct line to the target from the current position.
00448             if (dot > 0.0 && qFuzzyCompare(delta, proj) && endDot <= 0.0)
00449             {
00450                 curPos = targetPos;
00451             }
00452             else 
00453             {
00454                 // Otherwise draw at least some distance to the current direction.
00455                 // Check if the target is not behind the current position/direction.
00456                 if (qFuzzyCompare(curPos, startPos))
00457                 {
00458                     if (dot > 0.0 && !(endDot > 0.0 && qFuzzyCompare(delta, endDot * dir2)))
00459                     {
00460                         // Draw the length of the projection to the current direction
00461                         // or at least the minimum start length.
00462                         curPos = curPos + curDir * std::max(MIN_START_LENGTH, proj.length());
00463                     }
00464                     else
00465                     {
00466                         // Otherwise we just draw the minimum start length thub.
00467                         curPos = curPos + curDir * MIN_START_LENGTH;
00468                     }
00469                 }
00470                 // Check if the target is in the opposite direction compared to the current
00471                 // direction and we previously drew the starting thub.
00472                 else if (dot < 0 && qFuzzyCompare(curPos, startPos + curDir * MIN_START_LENGTH))
00473                 {
00474                     // Draw to the perpendicular direction at least the minimum length.
00475                     qreal length = std::max(perp.length(), MIN_LENGTH);
00476                     QVector2D dir = perp.normalized();
00477 
00478                     // Special case when the perpendicular vector would be zero-length.
00479                     if (dir.isNull())
00480                     {
00481                         // Rotate 90 degrees.
00482                         dir = QVector2D(curDir.y(), -curDir.x());
00483                     }
00484 
00485                     curPos = curPos + dir * length;
00486                     curDir = dir;
00487                 }
00488                 else
00489                 {
00490                     // Otherwise we just draw to the perpendicular direction as much as we can.
00491                     if (!perp.isNull())
00492                     {
00493                         curPos = curPos + perp;
00494                         curDir = perp.normalized();
00495                     }
00496                     else
00497                     {
00498                         // If the perpendicular vector was zero-length, we rotate the current
00499                         // direction 90 degrees and draw a minimum length thub to the new direction.
00500                         curDir = QVector2D(curDir.y(), -curDir.x());
00501                         curPos = curPos + curDir * MIN_LENGTH;
00502                     }
00503                 }
00504 
00505                 // Check if we would end up in a position where we are right behind the target.
00506                 QVector2D newDelta = targetPos - curPos;
00507                 qreal endDot = QVector2D::dotProduct(newDelta, dir2);
00508 
00509                 if (endDot > 0.0 && qFuzzyCompare(newDelta, endDot * dir2))
00510                 {
00511                     // Make an adjustment to the current position.
00512                     curPos += curDir * MIN_LENGTH;
00513                 }
00514             }
00515 
00516             // Add the newly calculated current position to the path.
00517             path.lineTo(curPos.toPointF());
00518             pathPoints_ << curPos.toPointF();
00519         }
00520 
00521         // Add the last segment if the target position was not the end position.
00522         if (!qFuzzyCompare(targetPos, endPos))
00523         {
00524             path.lineTo(endPos.toPointF());
00525             pathPoints_ << endPos.toPointF();
00526         }
00527     }
00528 
00529     simplifyPath();
00530 
00531     QPainterPathStroker stroker;
00532     setPath(stroker.createStroke(path));
00533 }
00534 
00535 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00536 // Function: createRoute()
00537 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00538 void EndpointConnection::createRoute(EndpointItem* endpoint1, EndpointItem* endpoint2)
00539 {
00540     Q_ASSERT(endpoint1 != 0);
00541     Q_ASSERT(endpoint2 != 0);
00542 
00543     QPointF p1 = endpoint1->scenePos();
00544     QPointF p2 = endpoint2->scenePos();
00545 
00546     // Auto-rotate the endpoints to get simpler paths.
00547     if (p2.x() - p1.x() >= EndpointItem::WIDTH)
00548     {
00549         endpoint1->setDirection(EndpointItem::DIR_RIGHT);
00550         endpoint2->setDirection(EndpointItem::DIR_LEFT);
00551     }
00552     else if (p1.x() - p2.x() >= EndpointItem::WIDTH)
00553     {
00554         endpoint1->setDirection(EndpointItem::DIR_LEFT);
00555         endpoint2->setDirection(EndpointItem::DIR_RIGHT);
00556     }
00557     else
00558     {
00559         // Otherwise inherit the second endpoint's direction from the first endpoint.
00560         endpoint2->setDirection(endpoint1->getDirection());
00561     }
00562 
00563     // Create the route.
00564     createRoute(p1, p2, endpoint1->getDirectionVector(), endpoint2->getDirectionVector());
00565 }
00566 
00567 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00568 // Function: simplifyPath()
00569 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00570 void EndpointConnection::simplifyPath()
00571 {
00572     for (int i = 0; i < pathPoints_.size() - 2; ++i)
00573     {
00574         QVector2D pt0 = QVector2D(pathPoints_[i]);
00575         QVector2D pt1 = QVector2D(pathPoints_[i + 1]);
00576         QVector2D pt2 = QVector2D(pathPoints_[i + 2]);
00577 
00578         QVector2D delta1 = pt1 - pt0;
00579         QVector2D delta2 = pt2 - pt1;
00580 
00581         QVector2D deltaProj = QVector2D::dotProduct(delta2, delta1.normalized()) * delta1.normalized();
00582 
00583         // If the path was otherwise ok, just remove parallel lines.
00584         if (qFuzzyCompare(deltaProj, delta2))
00585         {
00586             pathPoints_.removeAt(i + 1);
00587             --i;
00588         }                                
00589     }
00590 
00591     selected_ = -1;
00592     selectionType_ = NONE;
00593 }
00594 
00595 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00596 // Function: disconnectEnds()
00597 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00598 void EndpointConnection::disconnectEnds()
00599 {
00600     // Discard existing connections.
00601     if (endpoint1_)
00602     {
00603         endpoint1_->removeConnection(this);
00604         endpoint1_->onDisconnect(endpoint2_);
00605     }
00606 
00607     if (endpoint2_)
00608     {
00609         endpoint2_->removeConnection(this);
00610         endpoint2_->onDisconnect(endpoint1_);
00611     }
00612 
00613     endpoint1_ = 0;
00614     endpoint2_ = 0;
00615     emit contentChanged();
00616 }
00617 
00618 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00619 // Function: mousePressEvent()
00620 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00621 void EndpointConnection::mousePressEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *mouseEvent)
00622 {
00623     oldRoute_ = getRoute();
00624     QPointF pos = snapPointToGrid(mouseEvent->pos());
00625 
00626     if (pathPoints_.size() > 1)
00627     {
00628         for (int i = 0; i < pathPoints_.size()-1; i++)
00629         {
00630             if ((i == 0 && endpoint1_) || (i == pathPoints_.size()-2 && endpoint2_))
00631             {
00632                 continue;
00633             }
00634 
00635             if ((qFuzzyCompare(pathPoints_[i].x(), pos.x()) && qFuzzyCompare(pathPoints_[i+1].x(), pos.x())) ||
00636                 (qFuzzyCompare(pathPoints_[i].y(), pos.y()) && qFuzzyCompare(pathPoints_[i+1].y(), pos.y())))
00637             {
00638                     selected_ = i;
00639                     selectionType_ = SEGMENT;
00640             }
00641         }
00642     } else
00643     {
00644         selected_ = -1;
00645         selectionType_ = NONE;
00646     }
00647 
00648     QGraphicsPathItem::mousePressEvent(mouseEvent);
00649 }
00650 
00651 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00652 // Function: mouseMoveEvent()
00653 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00654 void EndpointConnection::mouseMoveEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *mouseEvent)
00655 {
00656     // Discard mouse move if the diagram is protected.
00657     if (static_cast<EndpointDesignDiagram*>(scene())->isProtected())
00658     {
00659         return;
00660     }
00661 
00662     QPointF newPos = snapPointToGrid(mouseEvent->pos());
00663 
00664     if (selectionType_ == SEGMENT)
00665     {
00666         if (qFuzzyCompare(pathPoints_[selected_].x(), pathPoints_[selected_+1].x()))
00667         {
00668             qreal prev = pathPoints_[selected_ - 1].x();
00669             qreal next = pathPoints_[selected_ + 2].x();
00670 
00671             // If the connection is on the same side of both the endpoints, try to change
00672             // the path in a way that even the side can be changed from left-to-right or right-to-left.
00673             if (endpoint1_->getDirection() == endpoint2_->getDirection() &&
00674                 abs(newPos.x() - prev) >= MIN_START_LENGTH && abs(newPos.x() - next) >= MIN_START_LENGTH)
00675             {
00676                 pathPoints_[selected_].setX(std::max(newPos.x(), 10.0));
00677                 pathPoints_[selected_ + 1].setX(std::max(newPos.x(), 10.0));
00678             }
00679             // Otherwise clamp the movement delta.
00680             else
00681             {
00682                 qreal delta = newPos.x() - pathPoints_[selected_].x();
00683                 qreal cur = pathPoints_[selected_].x();                
00684 
00685                 if (cur > next)
00686                 {
00687                     delta = std::max(delta, MIN_START_LENGTH + next - cur);
00688                 }
00689                 else
00690                 {
00691                     delta = std::min(delta, -MIN_START_LENGTH + next - cur);
00692                 }
00693 
00694                 if (cur > prev)
00695                 {
00696                     delta = std::max(delta, MIN_START_LENGTH + prev - cur);
00697                 }
00698                 else
00699                 {
00700                     delta = std::min(delta, -MIN_START_LENGTH + prev - cur);
00701                 }
00702 
00703                 pathPoints_[selected_].setX(pathPoints_[selected_].x() + delta);
00704                 pathPoints_[selected_+1].setX(pathPoints_[selected_+1].x() + delta);
00705             }
00706         }
00707         else if (qFuzzyCompare(pathPoints_[selected_].y(), pathPoints_[selected_+1].y()))
00708         {
00709             qreal prev = pathPoints_[selected_ - 1].y();
00710             qreal next = pathPoints_[selected_ + 2].y();
00711 
00712             // Change the route only if the next and previous segments would not be too short.
00713             if (abs(newPos.y() - prev) >= MIN_LENGTH && abs(newPos.y() - next) >= MIN_LENGTH)
00714             {
00715                 pathPoints_[selected_].setY(newPos.y());
00716                 pathPoints_[selected_+1].setY(newPos.y());
00717             }
00718         }
00719 
00720         setRoute(pathPoints_);
00721     }
00722 
00723     QGraphicsPathItem::mouseMoveEvent(mouseEvent);
00724 }
00725 
00726 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00727 // Function: mouseReleaseEvent()
00728 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00729 void EndpointConnection::mouseReleaseEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *mouseEvent)
00730 {
00731     if (selectionType_ == SEGMENT)
00732     {
00733         simplifyPath();
00734         setRoute(pathPoints_);
00735 
00736         if (getRoute() != oldRoute_)
00737         {
00738             QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd(new EndpointConnectionMoveCommand(this, oldRoute_));
00739             static_cast<EndpointDesignDiagram*>(scene())->getEditProvider().addCommand(cmd);
00740             
00741             emit contentChanged();
00742         }
00743     }
00744 
00745     QGraphicsPathItem::mouseReleaseEvent(mouseEvent);
00746 }
00747 
00748 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00749 // Function: paint()
00750 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00751 void EndpointConnection::paint(QPainter *painter, const QStyleOptionGraphicsItem *option,
00752                                QWidget *widget)
00753 {
00754     QStyleOptionGraphicsItem myoption = (*option);
00755     myoption.state &= !QStyle::State_Selected;
00756 
00757     QPen curPen = pen();
00758 
00759     if (option->state & QStyle::State_Selected)
00760     {
00761         curPen.setColor(Qt::red);
00762     }
00763     else
00764     {
00765         curPen.setColor(Qt::black);
00766     }
00767 
00768     setPen(curPen);
00769     QGraphicsPathItem::paint(painter, &myoption, widget);
00770 
00771     if (!endpoint1_)
00772         painter->fillRect(QRectF(pathPoints_.first()-QPointF(2,2),
00773         pathPoints_.first()+QPointF(2,2)),
00774         QBrush(Qt::red));
00775 
00776     if (!endpoint2_)
00777         painter->fillRect(QRectF(pathPoints_.last()-QPointF(2,2),
00778         pathPoints_.last()+QPointF(2,2)),
00779         QBrush(Qt::red));
00780 }
00781 
00782 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00783 // Function: updateName()
00784 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00785 void EndpointConnection::updateName()
00786 {
00787     Q_ASSERT(endpoint1_ != 0);
00788     Q_ASSERT(endpoint2_ != 0);
00789     name_ = endpoint1_->getFullName() + "_to_" + endpoint2_->getFullName();
00790 }
00791 
00792 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00793 // Function: beginUpdatePosition()
00794 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00795 void EndpointConnection::beginUpdatePosition()
00796 {
00797     oldRoute_ = getRoute();
00798 }
00799 
00800 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00801 // Function: endUpdatePosition()
00802 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00803 QUndoCommand* EndpointConnection::endUpdatePosition(QUndoCommand* parent)
00804 {
00805     if (getRoute() != oldRoute_)
00806     {
00807         return new EndpointConnectionMoveCommand(this, oldRoute_, parent);
00808     }
00809     else
00810     {
00811         return 0;
00812     }
00813 }
